name: Boxing Fighting PFS
description:
Boxing Fighting PFS - combines sophisticated the features of Action Fighting and Role Playing Game, together have this exciting action fighting game!is the coolest action fighting game full of blood. Just enter into the game and fight for the survival as can as possible. Fight to earn your honor and use flashy skills to stop your mortal opponents to continuously attacks with beautiful graphics, combat and sound effects.
Features:

- Real Martial-arts
- Fighting Control System
- Use Punching, Kicking, Jumping Buttons
- Joystick To Move
- Safe From Powerful Enemies
- Different Modes & Grappling Tricks
